mapper.insert: insert into SHARE_TICKET_IMG (UUID, QR_CODE, UPLOAD_IMG_UUID, CUT_UPLOAD_IMG_UUID, BEFORE_MONEY, AFTER_MONEY, TAOBAO_CODE, TITLE, CREATE_USER_UUID, CREATE_DATE, MODI_USER_UUID, MODI_DATE) values (#{uuid},#{QRCode},#{uploadImgUUID},#{cutUploadImgUUID},#{beforeMoney},#{afterMoney},#{taobaoCode},#{title}, #{createUserUUID},#{createDate},#{modiUserUUID},#{modiDate});
mapper.select: SELECT a.UUID as UUID, a.QR_CODE as QR_CODE, a.TAOBAO_CODE as TAOBAO_CODE, a.TITLE as TITLE, a.BEFORE_MONEY as BEFORE_MONEY, a.UPLOAD_IMG_UUID as UPLOAD_IMG_UUID, a.CUT_UPLOAD_IMG_UUID as CUT_UPLOAD_IMG_UUID, a.AFTER_MONEY as AFTER_MONEY, a.COPY_TIMES as COPY_TIMES, #{tipsName} as TIPS_NAME FROM SHARE_TICKET_IMG a INNER JOIN TIPS_RELATION b ON a.UUID = b.OTHER_UUID WHERE a.IS_DEL = '0' AND a.STATUS = '0' AND b.STATUS = '0' AND b.IS_DEL = '0' AND (b.TIPS_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{tipsName},'%') OR a.TITLE like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')) GROUP BY a.TITLE

select * from SHARE_TICKET_IMG where IS_DEL = '0' and STATUS = '0'
and TITLE like CONCAT ('%',#{title},'%')
order by CREATE_DATE desc
mapper.update: update SHARE_TICKET_IMG set STATUS = '1', MODI_DATE = #{modiDate} where STATUS = '0' and UUID = #{uuid} and ID = #{id}
update SHARE_TICKET_IMG set COPY_TIMES = COPY_TIMES + 1, MODI_DATE = #{modiDate} where STATUS = '0' and UUID = #{uuid} and ID = #{id} and COPY_TIMES = #{copyTimes}
